description: Get image size without full download (JPG, GIF, PNG, WebP, BMP, TIFF, PSD)
name: probe-image-size

scripts.report-coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
